yams.parser
Class AddressingOperand

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--yams.parser.Operand
        |
        +--yams.parser.AddressingOperand
public class AddressingOperand
extends Operand

Models the different types of addressing modes. Addressing operands are slightly more complicated then the other operands and they can be a combination of immediate, label and register.

Author:
Qian Qiao(qq01)

AddressingOperand

public AddressingOperand(int type,
                         java.lang.String value)
Constructs an addressing operand representing label or register depending on what is specified by the type parameter.

Parameters:
type - type of the operand. Crucial, as this distinguishes between label and register
value - value of the operand
